function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global lack of access to vaccines","Impact":"Continued spread of COVID-19 and prolonged pandemic","Mitigation":"Increase vaccine distribution and access globally","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution networks, cold chain storage technology","People":"Populations in countries without vaccine access","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Decrease in cancer diagnoses due to pandemic","Impact":"Delayed diagnosis and increased preventable cancer deaths","Mitigation":"Improve healthcare access and prioritize cancer screenings","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics","People":"Individuals at risk of delayed diagnosis","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Missed regular vaccinations for other infectious diseases during lockdown","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to other infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement catch-up vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Mobile vaccination units, community health workers","People":"Children in urban and rural areas","Owner":"Health departments, healthcare organizations"}]}
